description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Pendulous, Operator. Your help is requested to guide a displaced gear through the moving parts of this great machine. Swing from anchor to anchor, using shifting pipes and steam jets to hurry you along. But avoid the electrical arcs and twisting components that can send you tumbling into the deadly red mist below.
description.short: Welcome to Pendulous, Operator. Your help is requested to guide a displaced gear through the moving parts of this great machine. Swing from anchor to anchor, using shifting pipes and steam jets to hurry you along. But avoid the electrical arcs and twisting components that can send you tumbling into the deadly red mist below.
